#set ($workspaceManagerMainDocumentReference = $services.model.createDocumentReference($xcontext.mainWikiName, 'WorkspaceManager', 'WebHome')) #set ($isWorkspaceManagerAppInstalled = $xwiki.exists($workspaceManagerMainDocumentReference)) #set ($isWorkspace = $services.workspace.isWorkspace($xcontext.database)) #set ($isMainWikiUser = ($xcontext.mainWikiName == "$!{xcontext.userReference.wikiReference.name}")) ## ## User ## #if (!$xcontext.action.startsWith('login')) #if ($isGuest) #set ($loginurl = $xwiki.getURL('XWiki.XWikiLogin', 'login', "xredirect=$escapetool.url($xwiki.relativeRequestURL)")) #xwikitopmenuentry($!loginurl $!services.localization.render('login') 'tmLogin' 'fa fa-sign-in') #else #set ($logouturl = $xwiki.getURL('XWiki.XWikiLogout', 'logout', "xredirect=$escapetool.url($xwiki.relativeRequestURL)")) #xwikitopmenuentry($!logouturl $!services.localization.render('logout') 'tmLogout' 'fa fa-sign-out') #end #end #if ($isGuest && $xwiki.hasAccessLevel('register', 'XWiki.XWikiPreferences')) #set ($regurl = $xwiki.getURL('XWiki.Register', 'register')) #xwikitopmenuentry($!regurl $!services.localization.render('core.register') 'tmRegister' 'fa fa-plus-square') #end ## ## #if (!$isGuest) #if ($isSuperAdmin) #xwikitopmenuentry('#' $!services.localization.render('superadmin') 'tmUser' 'fa fa-user') #else #xwikitopmenuentry("$!xwiki.getURL($xcontext.user)" "$!xwiki.getUserName($xcontext.user, false)" 'tmUser' 'fa fa-user') #end #end
## ## Administration ## #set ($isAdminAppInstalled = $xwiki.exists('XWiki.AdminSheet')) #if ($isAdminAppInstalled && $hasSpaceAdmin) #set ($adminspaceaction = $!xwiki.getURL("XWiki.XWikiPreferences", 'admin')) #xwikitopmenuentry($adminspaceaction 'Administration' 'tmAdminSpace' 'fa fa-cogs') #end
{{/html}}{{/velocity}}
